title: Is it possible to play a CD on a DVD player in a computer? How? - Quora

response.answer_text: The tray drive, DVD on a computer is a multimedia player. Sometimes a recorder. Make sure you have the current driver/software for your specific player. Go under system settings io devices see your player and check sw version select update. It will either update or say best driver installed. If still no go do as other member Bryan Pashal stated go to win media player and control it from there. Good luck. TR

When you pop the CD in the drive, it should start playing immediately, but if for some reason that doesn't happen, just open up Windows Media Player and click on Player Library and you'll see the disk in there. Then just click on it to start playing it. :)
